articles.title: U.S. Department of Education Makes Historic Grant Investments in Programs That Bolster Educational Outcomes - U.S. Department of Education (.gov)
articles.description: Today, the U.S. Department of Education announced that it is making historic investments in charter schools, American history and civics programs, Historically Black Colleges and Universities and Tribally Controlled Colleges and Universities.
